statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_insurance;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT expiration_date, policy_number FROM vehicle_insurance ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details, expiration_date FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE policy_number = 1001;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%comprehensive%';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE policy_number = 100
SELECT policy_number, expiration_date, coverage_details FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_insurance ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE policy_number BETWEEN 200 AND 300
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM vehicle_insurance
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, policy_number FROM vehicles WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_address, contact_number FROM insurance_providers;
SELECT * FROM insurance_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM insurance_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, policy_number, coverage_details FROM vehicles WHERE expiration_date < '2023-12-31' ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name FROM insurance_providers WHERE LENGTH(provider_address) > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, coverage_details FROM vehicles WHERE policy_number LIKE '%ABC%' AND expiration_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT provider_name, contact_number FROM insurance_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy ORDER BY policy_number ASC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, expiration_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT driver_name, driver_license_number, driver_birthdate FROM driver_details WHERE driver_birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date, claim_description FROM claim_history WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT policy_number, vehicle_make, coverage_details FROM insurance_policy WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%comprehensive%';
SELECT policy_number, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM insurance_policy ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license_number, driver_birthdate FROM driver_details WHERE driver_birthdate <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND vehicle_model = 'Camry';
SELECT * FROM claim_history INNER JOIN insurance_policy ON claim_history.policy_number = insurance_policy.policy_number WHERE claim_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_description, driver_name FROM claim_history INNER JOIN driver_details ON claim_history.policy_number = driver_details.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM VehicleOwner;
SELECT owner_name, owner_id FROM VehicleOwner ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleDetails WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT make, model FROM VehicleDetails WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
SELECT policy_number, expiration_date FROM VehiclePolicy ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehiclePolicy WHERE policy_number = 'POL001';
SELECT policy_number, expiration_date FROM VehiclePolicy WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, make, model FROM VehicleOwner JOIN VehicleDetails ON VehicleOwner.owner_id = VehicleDetails.vehicle_id;
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM PolicyHistory ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT make, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS vehicle_count FROM VehicleDetails GROUP BY make HAVING COUNT(vehicle_id) > 1;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details, start_date, expiration_date FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM policy_holders;
SELECT driver_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM drivers ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, description, cost FROM accidents WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC

SELECT vehicles.make, vehicles.model, policy_holders.first_name, policy_holders.last_name FROM vehicles JOIN drivers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = drivers.driver_id JOIN policy_holders ON drivers.policy_id = policy_holders.holder_id

SELECT drivers.first_name, drivers.last_name, accidents.accident_date, accidents.description FROM drivers JOIN accidents ON drivers.policy_id = accidents.policy_id ORDER BY accidents.accident_date DESC

SELECT vehicles.make, vehicles.model, insurance_policies.policy_number, insurance_policies.start_date, insurance_policies.expiration_date FROM vehicles JOIN drivers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = drivers.driver_id JOIN insurance_policies ON drivers.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id WHERE vehicles.year < 2015
